name: Elemental Dragons
desc: An ancient race, who ruled Teyvat long before human existence. Dragons belong to the Light Realm.

customize.text: Relationships

customize.name: Primordial One
customize.desc: The First Descender, who defeated seven Dragon Sovereigns of the world and created people. The Primordial One may be Phanes.

customize.text: The Heavenly Principles invaded Teyvat and declared war on the ancient elemental dragons. Forty years later, the seven Dragon Sovereigns were defeated and the seven nations submitted to the Primordial One. The First Throne stole the authority of the elemental dragons to create the divine thrones.

customize.name: Angels
customize.desc: Also known as Heavenly envoys, their primary duties were to help people. They were later expelled from Celestia and consequently lost their bodies and minds.

customize.name: Seelie
customize.desc: Once a mighty race that lived to guide mankind. They have been cursed to degenerate into nothing but empty husks. They show those who follow them treasures hidden from human eyes.

customize.text:
Some angels and Seelie resisted the dragons. In Natlan, almost all angels and Seelie were destroyed.
Archons
Dragons consider the Archons as usurpers.

customize.name: Egeria
customize.desc: The previous Hydro Archon who died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago.

customize.text: When the first Hydro Dragon was killed, Celestia created Egeria to be the heart of the Primordial Sea. When Egeria was in the Primordial Sea, a new Hydro Dragon couldn't be reborn.

customize.name: Focalors
customize.desc: The last Hydro Archon and the God of Justice. She sacrificed herself in order to destroy the Hydro Archon's Divine Throne and restore power to the Hydro Dragon.

customize.text: The last Hydro Archon destroyed the divine throne and returned the dragon's authority to the Hydro Dragon.

customize.name: Durin
customize.desc: The Shadow Dragon and one of Rhinedottir's children.

customize.text: Shadow dragon from the Abyss, created by

customize.name: Rhinedottir
customize.desc: An alchemist, a member of the Hexenzirkel, one of the five Sinners of Khaenri'ah, and Albedo's mother. Rhinedottir created an army of shadowy monsters, who attacked Teyvat 500 years ago. She's also known as Gold and R.

customize.text:
.
Although he is called a dragon, he belongs to the Void Realm and is not from a dragon race.

customize.name: Elynas
customize.desc: An Abyssal beast that appeared in Fontaine 500 years ago during the Cataclysm. Elynas is the "Father" of all Melusines.

customize.text: Dragonlike creature, brother of Durin and son of Rhinedottir. He belongs to the Void Realm and is not from a dragon race.
Seven Dragon Sovereigns

customize.name: Nibelung
customize.desc: The leader of the elemental dragons, who traveled beyond the world of Teyvat to gain the power of the Abyss to fight the Heavenly Principles.

customize.text: The Dragon King, leader of the elemental dragons. When the Primordial One won the war, Nibelung acquired the power of darkness from outside of this world and led the dragons in a fight against the order established by the outsiders.

The Dendro Sovereign who ruled Sumeru. She stayed loyal to Nibelung and attempted to collect more forbidden knowledge from the corners of the world but was stopped by the giant spike that fell from the sky. Apep made a deal with

customize.name: Al-Ahmar
customize.desc: The ruler of the Sumeru desert. He is also known as King Deshret.

customize.text:
that after his death, all the knowledge he came to accumulate would belong to her. As Al-Ahmar was corrupted with the forbidden knowledge, Apep also got corrupted. Thousands of years later, she was healed by the Dendro Archon.
First Hydro Dragon
A heart of the Primordial Sea, that was destroyed by the first throne.

customize.name: Neuvillette
customize.desc: The Chief Justice of Fontaine, known as the Iudex, is renowned for his unassailable impartiality.

customize.text: The reborn Hydro Dragon, who gained his full authority after the Hydro divine throne was destroyed.

customize.name: Xiuhcoatl
customize.desc: The Pyro Sovereign, defeated by the first Pyro Archon, Xbalanque. He faked his own death, after which the descendants of the ancient dragons could only bow before the throne and watch as their civilization inevitably faded away with each passing day.

customize.text: The Flamelord, who was defeated by the first Pyro Archon,

customize.name: Xbalanque
customize.desc: The first Pyro Archon, who defeated the Flamelord and revived from the flames.

customize.text: Notable Dragons

customize.name: Azhdaha
customize.desc: Elemental life form whose lifespan far exceeds that of mankind, brought by Rex Lapis to the surface. Morax carved him into a dragon and gave him eyes to see the sun. Azhdaha had been a friend and ally of the Geo Archon for many years.

customize.text:
The Geo Dragon Lord, whom the Geo Archon, Morax, gave the eyes. Azhdaha helped the people of Liyue for many years until his consciousness was damaged by erosion.
It is unknown if Azhdaha is a Geo Sovereign.

customize.name: Dvalin
customize.desc: An Elemental Dragon and the Anemo Archon Barbatos's friend. After being poisoned by the Shadow Dragon's blood, he became known as Stormterror.

customize.text:
An elemental dragon of the wind, a friend of the Anemo Archon, Barbatos. He is one of the Four Winds and the protector of Mondstadt.
It is unknown if Dvalin is an Anemo Sovereign.

customize.name: Scylla
customize.desc: The Prince of Vishaps and Remus's friend.

customize.text:
The dragon prince who led the army of the Fontemer's Vishaps until the Hydro Dragon could be reborn.
K'uhul Ajaw
A self-proclaimed "Divine Lord," a bona fide relic from the era of dragons, dating back several millennia. His true form has been sealed within an enigmatic engraved wristband, his current one being a mere projection via phlogiston. K'uhul Ajaw signed an unbreakable pact with

customize.name: Kinich
customize.desc: A Huitztlan Saurian Hunter skilled at counting costs.

customize.text: that the dragon would lend his power to Kinich. In exchange, Kinich would take Ajaw out to see the outside world, and upon his passing, his body would be Ajaw's to take for his own use.

customize.name: Waxaklahun Ubah Kan
customize.desc: The wisest among dragons, who stole the flame from his kind and taught people how to use it. He wanted to create a ruler of the dragon and human worlds. His true name is Kukulkan.

customize.text:
A dragon who stole the phlogiston from his kind and taught humans how to use it. He tried to create a ruler who would be stronger than the Heavenly Principles and the dragons.
Ix Uxul Tz'ib Bolon Ch'ule-L
Type-L Self-Regulating Overseer Array Integrated Processing Unit, the Dragonlord of Chichen Uctokah.
Ursa the Drake
A dragon that terrorized Mondstadt for over a thousand years. It was defeated by the Fatui Harbinger, Dottore.
